text: Andrea Louise Riseborough (born 20 November 1981) is an English actress. For her role in the 2022 movie To Leslie, she was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actress. Her best known roles were in Happy-Go-Lucky (2008), Never Let Me Go, Brighton Rock, Made in Dagenham (all 2010), W.E. (2011), Shadow Dancer, Disconnect (both 2012), Welcome to the Punch, Oblivion (both 2013), Birdman (2014), Nocturnal Animals (2016), Battle of the Sexes, The Death of Stalin (both 2017), Mandy, Nancy (both 2018), The Grudge and Possessor (both 2020). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:People from Tyne and Wear
title: Andrea Riseborough
